Elon Musk: I would choose to swap places with Elon Musk because he is a true visionary and entrepreneur who is pushing the boundaries of technology and innovation. I would love to see firsthand the inner workings of his mind and the challenges he faces in his quest to revolutionize transportation, energy, and space exploration.

Nelson Mandela: I would choose to swap places with Nelson Mandela because he was a symbol of hope and freedom in the fight against apartheid in South Africa. I would like to experience the struggles and triumphs he faced during his time in prison and his efforts to bring about change in his country.

Marie Curie: I would choose to swap places with Marie Curie because she was a trailblazer in the field of science and made groundbreaking discoveries in physics and chemistry. I would love to see the world through her eyes and learn about her experiences as a woman in a male-dominated field.

Steve Jobs: I would choose to swap places with Steve Jobs because he was a visionary and innovative entrepreneur who transformed the way we live, work, and communicate. I would love to see the world through his eyes and gain a deeper understanding of his creative process.

Malala Yousafzai: I would choose to swap places with Malala Yousafzai because she is a courageous and inspiring advocate for girls' education in Pakistan. I would like to experience the challenges she faces in her fight for education and the impact she has had on the world.
